skillTree.name: Gorebeast Chariot
skillTree.description: A Gorebeast Chariot is a massive construction of hell-forged metal, mutant beast and jagged blade, ridden to war by some of the most powerful and bloodthirsty warriors in the world.

skillTree.name: Burning Brand
skillTree.description: What magic can penetrate the searing hatred within the minds of the Blood God's most brutal followers.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

skillTree.name: Fury of Styrbjorn
skillTree.description: "We will slaughter them all, and laugh as they beg for mercy. It will be a good day."

skillTree.name: Infernal Champion
skillTree.description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Raging Stalwart
skillTree.description: No magic can deter one driven by the murderous force of fury.

skillTree.name: Hateful Corruptor
skillTree.description: Hatred is such a simple emotion, and one so easy for mortals to be consumed by.

skillTree.name: Call to Bloodletting
skillTree.description: Every skull taken in the Blood God's honour proves this one's loyalty to the Skull Throne.

skillTree.name: Commander of the Hound
skillTree.description: A leader is needed on the field of battle, able to rally the forces of the Hound in even the most dire situations.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Axe-Maidens of Strovengaard
backgroundSkills.description: Egil Styrbjorn has taken many consorts from amongst the womenfolk of Strovengaard, for many women of Norsca are desirous to share their beds with warriors who bear the stigmata of the Dark Gods. From these countless wives did Styrbjorn sire a brood of 13 progeny of all ages, amongst them were Hrefna and Fraygerd, axe-maidens of consummate skill and deadliness.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Fraygerd when embedded into the same army as Hrefna
Melee attack: +5 for Fraygerd when embedded into the same army as Hrefna

backgroundSkills.name: Barded Chaos Steed
backgroundSkills.description: The steeds of Chaos are vicious mounts enveloped in thick plate barding - coal-black chargers infused with Daemon blood and a temperament to match.

ui_effects.description: Spawns Edmund, the loyal family dog

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne
Attribute: Strider for Flesh Hounds of Khorne units

items.name: Styrbjorn's Family Heirloom
items.description: This heirloom is not like the other heirlooms, this one comes with a protecting family dog.
